title: Great hotel in fantastic location in Central London
text:
I am a regular visitor of London, and try to stay in different areas to enjoy the city after work. This hotel is one of my favorite and looking forward staying here again April 9th for 2 nights. Location unbeatable, as many things are on walkable distance. Hotel itself is beautiful with a touch of old grandeur. Lovely staff and willing to make the extra effort to support you!
Room Tip: Rooms can vary in size, so please inform at check in See more room tips
